column5: Iceguy was kind enough to teach an old dog some new tricks on the big water this morning.  We went out a fair distance to his secret spot.   It was a lovely morning on the big water....    Rods were busy going 11 for 14 with a mixed bag of shakers and teens and the lines start humming immediately - even before we could get the metal on the riggers.  Not long before Iceguy got some nice action...    Fortunately, the fishing gods were happy with my jersey selection and showed some mercy on me as well...    In the name of hospitality, we invited a couple of shakers over for dinner.  Mine is about to walk the plank - cedar plank that is.    Overall, an awesome start to the weekend!  Thanks again Rob for your expertise and patience!!!  SS.
sounds like you had a good day,nice fish
I'm glad to the the St,Louis circa 1994 jersey brought some luck. Good day out there SS, next time will have cristen your boat with some blood and slime.
I'm up for it.  BTW, shakey was very tasty!
Glad you enjoyed the the shaker,Did he walk the plank? I'll giver hell in the morning and bring me a derby winner.
Hey Rob, how did it go today?
Nice report & fish too!!!! cool pics,and yes fishing has been real good last few days on lake ontario...cheers
